Ligatures can be encoded using the ligature element. The@formattribute is available for specifying if the ligature isrectaorobliqua.
Recta and obliqua ligatures
In cases where the ligature contains both *recta* andobliquanotes, the@ligattribute of the note element can be used to specify the form of the ligature at the note level.
